venue.address_1: At the end of Zealand Road
venue.name: Zealand Parking Lot
venue.address_3: drive to the end and park in the lots

item.description:
*** This event is categorized as strenuous and is not for beginners ***

Total Distance: 19.76 miles
Book Time: 12 hours
Elevation Gain: +4600 ft
This is a fair weather only event.

West Bond, Bond & Bondcliff are in the center of the Pemi Wilderness and offer some of the best views in all the Whites. We will go in via Zealand and out via Lincoln Woods. We will make a stop at the beautiful Zealand Falls, soak in the views from Zeacliff and ascend to the open summit of Mt. Guyot. From here we make our way to the summit of W. Bond. We continue on to Mt. Bond and finally make our way to the dramatic cliffs of Bondcliff. We will then descend Bondcliff and head out via Lincoln Woods.
Distance: 19.76 miles
Time: 12 hours
Elevation Gain: +4600 ft

***** IMPORTANT NOTES *****
This event is categorized as STRENUOUS and is not for beginners.
We will assess weather, time, trail conditions and the physical condition of the group during our climb. Changes can & will be made as necessary. Mountain weather is subject to rapid changes and extreme conditions. Be prepared. Traveling with the appropriate gear & knowing how to use it is your personal responsibility.
By joining this event you certify that you have read and agree to the terms of the NEHAG Disclaimer
item.how_to_find_us: I drive a 2003 Gold Honda Accord
item.name: The Bonds
